biotools.summary: DIA-DB is a web server for the prediction of diabetes drugs that uses two different approaches; a) comparison by similarity with a curated database of anti-diabetic drugs and experimental compounds, and b) inverse virtual screening of the input molecules chosen by the users against a set of protein targets identified as key elements in diabetes.

bioschemas.name: DIA-DB
bioschemas.summary: DIA-DB is a web server for the prediction of diabetes drugs that uses two different approaches; a) comparison by similarity with a curated database of anti-diabetic drugs and experimental compounds, and b) inverse virtual screening of the input molecules chosen by the users against a set of protein targets identified as key elements in diabetes.
